def_cn: 做手势；比划；哑剧动作;哑剧表演
def_en: Mime is the use of movements and gestures in order to express something or tell a story without using speech.

def_cn: 比划；用手势表示；以哑剧动作表达
def_en: If you mime something, you describe or express it using mime rather than speech.
If you mime, you pretend to be singing or playing an instrument, although the music is in fact coming from a CD or cassette.
